mapper.select:
select * from ( select price, feature, rownum from ( select price, feature from( select sum(buylist_totalprice) as price, product_feature as feature from buylistview
where buylist_date >= to_date(#{startDate}, 'yymmddhh24miss') and buylist_date <= to_date(#{endDate}, 'yymmddhh24miss')
group by product_feature ) order by price desc
) ) order by feature asc
